title: National Volunteer Week, 2025
summary: The document is a proclamation by President Donald J. Trump declaring April 20 through April 26, 2025, as National Volunteer Week. It emphasizes the vital role of volunteers in strengthening communities and highlights their selfless service in various sectors such as soup kitchens, shelters, schools, and hospitals. The proclamation expresses gratitude for the contributions of volunteers, recognizing them as role models who inspire others through their commitment to helping those in need. The President calls on all Americans to engage in service projects during this week and to integrate volunteerism into their daily lives, reinforcing the idea that collective action can lead to a stronger nation.
